Oct 12 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - DIRECTORATE APPOINTMENT *AIRTEL AFRICA - ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF TSEGA GEBREYES AS AN INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 12-OCT-202106:00:05 GMT
